item.title: copy and deep copy in python
learn python the hard way
item.description: .ox-hugo-toc ul { list-style: none; } Table of Contents 1 a small surprise in ex4.py 2 imcompatiblility between python 3.5 and 3.6 3 default end is enter 4 the multiline string 5 help in Ipython 6 call a script with more inputs 7 open a file 8 call function recursively 9 the input of a function 10 variable in the for loop 11 the range function 12 variable in the for loop and range 13 a project skeleton
